SEARCH
Package com.prototype.occupi.controller

Class DeviceController

java.lang.Object
com.prototype.occupi.controller.DeviceController
@RestController public class DeviceController extends Object
The DeviceController class is a Spring controller that handles REST API requests related to devices. It provides methods for creating, reading, updating, and deleting Device objects from a database using the DeviceRepository interface. This class is annotated with @RestController and @Transactional to enable transaction management for database operations.

      HTTP PATCH method to update a Device.

      mac - Mac address of the Device to update
      Returns:
      Device object that was updated

    • deleteDeviceByMac

      @DeleteMapping("/devices/{mac}") public String deleteDeviceByMac(@PathVariable("mac") String mac)
      HTTP DELETE method to delete a Device by mac address.
      Parameters:
      mac - Mac address of the Device to delete
      Returns:
      String message indicating the Device was deleted
